description: Start with a(1)=1, a(2)=2. Thereafter, if gcd(a(n-2),a(n-1)) = 1 then a(n) is the smallest unused k such that gcd(a(n-2),k) > 1 and gcd(a(n-1),k) = 1, otherwise a(n) is the smallest unused k such that gcd(a(n-2),k) = 1 and gcd(a(n-1),k) > 1. If the latter is impossible, then a(n) = smallest missing number u. (See comments.)
